value.title: EU’s plan to woo chip manufacturers won’t work, Taiwan says
value.excerpt: The EU may be interested in convincing Taiwan's chipmakers to build chips in Europe, but most chip production is expected to stay in Taiwan.

value.title: Q&A: Vivienne Sze on crossing the hardwire-software divide for efficient AI
value.excerpt: Vivienne Sze is an MIT researcher who is co-designing artificial intelligence hardware and software to be more energy efficient.

value.title: AMD bets on strong demand for chips as revenue soars 93%
value.excerpt: AMD raised its annual revenue forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong demand for its chips used in data centers and personal computers.

value.title: Xiaomi Is Said to Mull Investing in AI Chipmaker Black Sesame
value.excerpt: Mobile phone giant Xiaomi Corp. is among investors considering joining a funding round of at least 1.5 billion yuan ($231 million) for Black Sesame Technologies Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.

value.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti, RTX 3050 GPU Clocks, TGP, Other Specs Leaked By Lenovo
value.excerpt: The specs of the unannounced Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti and RTX 3050 have been leaked by the Chinese multinational tech company Lenovo. A recent report from Videocardz revealed that Lenovo accidentally listed its new Legion gaming notebooks housing the unannounced Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti and GeForce RTX 3050 GPUs.

value.title: Huawei Technologies unveils range of AI chips
value.excerpt: China’s largest telecom equipment maker and smartphone vendor Huawei Technologies Co Ltd has unveiled a range of artificial intelligence chips, in what is arguably its biggest-ever push to expand its presence in the semiconductor sector and to compete with US companies such as Nvidia Corp.

value.title: Cerebras launches new AI supercomputing processor with 2.6 trillion transistors
value.excerpt: Cerebras Systems has unveiled its new Wafer Scale Engine 2 processor with a record-setting 2.6 trillion transistors and 850,000 AI cores.

value.title: Xilinx launches Kria chips to handle AI for edge applications
value.excerpt: Xilinx has introduced its Kria programmable chips and boards for holding AI applications at the edge of the network.

value.title: Anari AI Raises $2M to Rebuild the AI Hardware Industry Through Personalized Cloud Chips
value.excerpt: Anari AI raised $2 million in seed funding led by Earlybird VC, to rebuild the AI hardware industry from scratch.

value.title: Nvidia Shares Up 11% This Week On New Supercomputing Chip
value.excerpt: Shares of graphics chip maker Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) jumped 11% this week after the company announced its new Grace chip created specifically for artificial intelligence data centers.

value.title: AI Chip Startup Groq, Founded By Ex-Googlers, Raises $300 Million To Power Autonomous Vehicles And Data Centers
value.excerpt: Groq founder Jonathan Ross, who helped invent Google's tensor processing unit, has plans to double the AI chip startup's staff and expand its customers beyond existing ones in data centers and autonomous vehicles.

value.title: AI chip maker SambaNova raises $676 million, valued at over $5 billion
value.excerpt: SambaNova Systems, a Silicon Valley startup that makes semiconductors for artificial intelligence related computation work, said on Tuesday it raised $676 million in a funding round led by SoftBank Group Corp’s Vision Fund 2.

value.title: SambaNova raises $676M to mass-produce AI training and inference chips
value.excerpt: AI chip startup SambaNova systems has raised $676 million, bringing its total raised to over $1 billion at a $5 billion valuation.

value.title: Microsoft Releases AI Training Library ZeRO-3 Offload
value.excerpt: Microsoft recently open-sourced ZeRO-3 Offload, an extension of their DeepSpeed AI training library that improves memory efficiency while training very large deep-learning models. ZeRO-3 Offload allows users to train models with up to 40 billion parameters on a single GPU and over 2 trillion parameters on 512 GPUs.

value.title: Avaya Enabling the Composable Enterprise with New AI Capabilities in Collaboration with NVIDIA
value.excerpt: Avaya (NYSE:AVYA), a global leader in solutions to enhance and simplify communications and collaboration, is providing attendees at the NVIDIA GPU Technology Conference with new insights into how AI capabilities integrated into its Avaya OneCloud immersive collaboration and communications portfolio will enable today’s composable enterprise to effortlessly deliver memorable experiences for customers and staff.

value.title: Nvidia announces new GPU collaborations, latest DPU for AI computing at data centres
value.excerpt: Nvidia announced a series of collaborations that will combine Nvidia GPUs and software with Arm-based GPUs, extending Arm's flexible, energy-efficient architecture to computing workloads from the cloud to the edge.

value.title: Nvidia unveils quantum computing simulation tools, strengthens grip on GPU accelerated-AI
value.excerpt: Nvidia has unveiled a software library called cuQuantum that can help scientists better understand the behaviour of quantum computers.

value.title: Cloudera partners with Nvidia to expand GPU usage across AI applications
value.excerpt: Integrating Cloudera Data Platform and Nvidia's Apache Spark 3.0 libraries will simplify adding machine learning workflows to processes.

value.title: Nvidia unveils Grace ARM-based CPU for giant-scale AI and HPC apps
value.excerpt: Nvidia today unveiled its Grace ARM-based processor for giant-scale artificial intelligence and high-performance computing applications.
